requirements: ['Valid passport', 'Completed and signed application form', 'Recent biometric photo', 'Travel medical insurance', 'Proof of accommodation', 'Proof of financial means', 'Polish language certificate (if applicable)']
notes: This visa is for temporary stay in Poland. A Polish language certificate may be required for certain applications. Processing times may vary depending on the complexity of the application. For more information, contact the Polish Embassy or Consulate in Pakistan.
